title: How is 19/0/6 in 27 minutes not an S+?
body: I know my CS was pretty wank, but come on. It shouldn't have a bigger impact than kills and assists, because that's how it seems to be.

replies.body:
S+ = everythings perfect

You did bad in cs? Everything isn't perfect

Because you have 164 cs at 27 minutes, in mid lane. Thats 6.1 CS/m, thats my average in jungle lol. CS=Lane Pressure, which is even more important than KDA. I've gotten multiple S+s on trynd with under 10 kills simply because my CS/m was over 10CS/m and i had taken 5 or more towers
The biggest secret I can give you is to place pink wards as a non support. Pretty sure that guarantees you an A in its own

Ratings are based on a curve.

So your performance was judged compared to the performance of every single time that champion has been played. If the highest scores for that champion include similar kda's but with way way better CS, then you weren't as good and don't deserve the S+ per the system.
Well S+ is meant to be the highest rating, so they expect you to have good everything to get it
Saying kill stealing and you haven't got a clue what actually happened in the game. Don't use the boards if you're going to be like this.

> [{quoted}](name=datfatguy,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kzt7agmm,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-03-18T00:54:25.565+0000)
>
> Saying kill stealing and you haven't got a clue what actually happened in the game. Don't use the boards if you're going to be like this.

You didn't link the game, sorry I assumed you did not do well. I will delete my rude comment.

Now for a real answer. The exact reason you didnt get an S+ was only because yasuo on the enemy team got more than you. Even though your cs was a little low, if you had gotten top in the game it would have given you that +.

I know how it works, I get S+ often and pay attention to the details.
I don't think it counts when the enemy laner dies to you 12 times in a row.

Kills contribute very little (most likely zero) to score

If they did, it would become league of CoD with everyone freaking out about killstealing.

Total damage, contribution/presence at fights, objective damage/presence, CC score, vision score, gold earned, CS all matter.

They already do that in low silver/bronze lol
Bronze quote of the day "Why farm minions when i can farm champions" - B5 Riven main

> [{quoted}](name=EHPBLuurr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kzt7agmm,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-03-18T01:41:48.643+0000)
>
> They already do that in low silver/bronze lol
> Bronze quote of the day "Why farm minions when i can farm champions" - B5 Riven main

One minion wave: about 180 gold

One Yasuo: about 150 gold

>
> They already do that in low silver/bronze lol
> Bronze quote of the day "Why farm minions when i can farm champions" - B5 Riven main

actually thats pretty viable in bronze, i remember going 20+ kill games as Fizz there.
its prolly the CS, they never tent to give anything higher than an A+ without good CS. i mean ive gone 4/1/7 and gotten S because of CS.
